name: Shaun White Downhill Dash
description:
Play as one of the world’s most famous athletes, Shaun White, in a quest to get as far downhill as you can without crashing. Tap and hold to find the gaps and slide through at a high-speed. Simple to learn, yet endlessly addictive.

- Dodge an assortment of obstacles and collect coins while besting your top score.
- Discover all of the differently-themed, nostalgically-rendered 8-bit Shauns.
- Unlock 15+ additional wacky characters. Cavemen! Spies! Aliens!
- Challenge your friends to see who is the king of the mountain.
